outputs.name: horiz_infrared
outputs.description:
A data collection or value indicating the downwelling
horizontal infrared radiation [W/m2]

inputs.name: _sky_cover
inputs.description: A value or data collection representing sky cover [tenths]

inputs.name: _dry_bulb
inputs.description: A value or data collection representing  dry bulb temperature [C]

inputs.name: _dew_point
inputs.description: A value or data collection representing dew point temperature [C]

name: DF Horizontal Infrared
description:
Calculate downwelling horizontal infrared radiation intensity from sky cover,
dry bulb temperature, and dew point temperature.
-
